p: The citation “38 U.S.C. § 3701 et seq” has been changed to “38 U.S.C. § 3701 et seq., n.d.” to match the author name/date in the reference list. Please check if the change is fine in this occurrence and modify the subsequent occurrences, if necessary.38 U.S.C. § 3701 et seq. n.d. (current provisions)
